about_the_game:
In a colony at the far west of the galaxy, escalating conflicts threaten to destabilize everything around it. While extremist factions vie for power, the safety of citizens is gradually eroding, and the colony's integration with the central government is at imminent risk. Amidst this chaos, a group seeks to counteract this hostile situation, but their actions have drawn dangerous attention.

The challenge falls upon the shoulders of a retired sheriff, tasked with making a difference. But can someone torn apart by painful losses overcome their own wounds and face this adversity? The answer unfolds in "On Life and Living", an immersive playable graphic novel filled with exploration, challenges, and captivating characters.

In "On Life and Living", beyond metroidvania-style exploration and challenging encounters, players will also experience an emotional story of love, grief, and consequences. You are in control, shaping the course of this journey towards regeneration.

Comic Book Narrative: Enjoy a vibrant and twist-filled narrative presented in comic book format, without worrying about the dust or crumpled pages of physical versions.

Explore the Unexplored: Take a stroll through incredible landscapes and this expanding colony. Just don't forget to stay alert; danger might be right under your nose!

A Galaxy of Challenges: Face enemies from all corners of the galaxy. Not just lackeys and minor bandits, but also formidable bosses looking to profit from the expansion of a new world.

Old Gunslinger: Dust off your shooting skills and agility to become the quickest and most skilled gunslinger in Farwest-E. Upgrade your arsenal and acquire new abilities to defeat your enemies in diverse and thrilling ways.

For a Few Coins More: Contribute to the galaxy's safety as a bounty hunter, tracking down and capturing wanted enemies. Nobody wants to work in fear for their family's safety back home, right?

Best Companion: Have a fun and protective partner to cheer you up (and eat your food) during tough times.

Images are from a work-in-progress version and may differ from the final release.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not suitable for all ages, such as frequent violence and the topic of grief can be a touchy subject

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U (4 * 1800) or equivalent; AMD Phenom II X4 965 (4 * 3400) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 ( 2048 MB); Radeon RX 580 (8192 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent; AMD FX-8350 (8 * 4700) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 ( 2048 MB); Radeon RX 580 (8192 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
